summary.title: Initial Threat Model
summary.description:
This initial Threat Model is built based on a Message Board applications.
The system sample is as Follows:
Presents the user with a login page (username and password)
Uses an open source component to authenticate the user credentials against a database
If the username and password presented exist in the database, present the user with a message-of-the-day stored in the database
Allow the user to comment on the message-of-the-day (comments will be stored in the database)

data.name: Browser
data.description:
User will select preferred browser:
Chrome, firefox, edge

threats.title: New STRIDE threat
threats.description: If user is not verified it can deny the access
threats.mitigation: User should complete correct login and also verify with 2-form verification

threats.title: New STRIDE threat
threats.description: Other user pretending to be another user to login to another account to post messages or comments
threats.mitigation: having the user be alerted when someone trying to login from different location or device to remediate risk
